title: How to write in the first grade - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not sure I understand the question. Please clarify. If you want to know how to write in a first grade classroom, the answer is to follow carefully the structure of each letter and to use large and open forms so that the young students are not confused.

response.answer_text: Very carefully and just one letter at a time, until you can write that letter without trouble each time. Don’t be in a hurry just practice and it will come about.
